desc: The Wool Sak in Ayr Saltcoats and Kilmarnock ,, Ayrshire sell a large range of knitting yarns, knitting wool, knitting patterns, knitting needles and knitting accessories. We stock Sirdar, Robin, Wendy, Hayfield, King Cole, James C Brett , Pony, knit pro, groves and banks, Rico and woolcraft.

layout.text: The Wool Sak Kilmarnock,Ayr & Saltcoats have been serving the people of Ayrshire with wool for over 45years.
